name: hlrel

body.origin:
|- wrel(chlo)
-| wss(chlo, ccbn)
-| wrel(ccbn)
-| wi(wss(chlo, ccbn), wi(wrel(ccbn), wrel(chlo)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CHilOLD)
⊣ CHilOLD ⊆ CBan
⊣ Rel(CBan)
⊣ (CHilOLD ⊆ CBan →(Rel(CBan)→ Rel(CHilOLD)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(chlo)
-| wss(chlo, ccbn)
-| wrel(ccbn)
-| wi(wss(chlo, ccbn), wi(wrel(ccbn), wrel(chlo)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CHilOLD)
⊣ CHilOLD ⊆ CBan
⊣ Rel(CBan)
⊣ (CHilOLD ⊆ CBan →(Rel(CBan)→ Rel(CHilOLD)))

body.origin:
|- wss(chlo, ccbn)
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), chlo), wcel(cv(hs0), ccbn))
-| diffsc(hs0, chlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
body.pretty:
⊢ CHilOLD ⊆ CBan
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CHilOLD → hs0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ d(hs0, CHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(chlo)
-| wrel(ccbn)
-| wi(wss(chlo, ccbn), wi(wrel(ccbn), wrel(chlo)))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), chlo), wcel(cv(hs0), ccbn))
-| diffsc(hs0, chlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CHilOLD)
⊣ Rel(CBan)
⊣ (CHilOLD ⊆ CBan →(Rel(CBan)→ Rel(CHilOLD)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ CHilOLD → hs0 ∈ CBan)
⊣ d(hs0, CHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(chlo)
-| wrel(ccbn)
-| wi(wss(chlo, ccbn), wi(wrel(ccbn), wrel(chlo)))
-| diffsc(hs0, chlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CHilOLD)
⊣ Rel(CBan)
⊣ (CHilOLD ⊆ CBan →(Rel(CBan)→ Rel(CHilOLD)))
⊣ d(hs0, CHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(chlo)
-| wi(wss(chlo, ccbn), wi(wrel(ccbn), wrel(chlo)))
-| diffsc(hs0, chlo)
-| diffsc(hs0, ccbn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(CHilOLD)
⊣ (CHilOLD ⊆ CBan →(Rel(CBan)→ Rel(CHilOLD)))
⊣ d(hs0, CHilOLD)
⊣ d(hs0, CBan)

comment: The class of all complex Hilbert spaces is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
